question: Which city is hosting the 2017 Women's Youth World Boxing Championship (YWBC)?
explanation: The 2017 Women\'s Youth World Boxing Championship (YWBC) has started in Guwahati, Assam on November 19, 2017. Approx 200 participants from 38 countries will be seen in action in this knockout tournament. The preliminaries will take place from November 19 to 22, the semi-finals on November 24 and 25 and the finals on November 26.
